name: Dark Sign (demastered)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS: Use arrow keys to play the game.

I remade the Undead Asylum from Dark Souls in Bitsy!  It has working bonfire respawns, ghostly messages of dubious aid, and a trick boss fight!  

If you want to make your own Bitsy game, start today! 

Also, special thanks to Dan Cox for their wonderful tutorial videos!
